com.maxleap

类 MLAnalytics

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.maxleap.MLAnalytics

  • public final class MLAnalytics
extends Object
    The MLAnalytics class provides an interface to ML's logging and analytics backend. Methods will return immediately and cache requests. That is, the request will be sent immediately if possible or the next time a network connection is available otherwise.

      • logEvent

        public static void logEvent(String eventId)
        Tracks the occurrence of a custom event. MaxLeap will store a data point at the time of invocation with the given event name.
        参数:
        eventId - The eventId of the custom event to report to ML as having happened.

      • logEvent

        public static void logEvent(String eventId,
            Map<String,String> dimensions)
        Tracks the occurrence of a custom event. MaxLeap will store a data point at the time of invocation with the given event name.
        参数:
        eventId - The eventId of the custom event to report to ML as having happened.
        dimensions - The dictionary of information by which to segment this event.

      • logEvent

        public static void logEvent(String eventId,
            long eventCount,
            Map<String,String> dimensions)
        Tracks the occurrence of a custom event. MaxLeap will store a data point at the time of invocation with the given event name.
        参数:
        eventId - The eventId of the custom event to report to ML as having happened.
        eventCount - The count of the custom event had happened.
        dimensions - The dictionary of information by which to segment this event.

      • onChargeRequest

        public static void onChargeRequest(MLIapTransaction transaction)
        Tracks the occurrence of begin requesting purchase.
        参数:
        transaction - The transaction of purchase.

      • onChargeSuccess

        public static void onChargeSuccess(MLIapTransaction transaction)
        Tracks the occurrence of doing purchase and successfully.
        参数:
        transaction - The transaction of purchase.

      • onChargeFailed

        public static void onChargeFailed(MLIapTransaction transaction)
        Tracks the occurrence of failed to completing purchase.
        参数:
        transaction - The transaction of purchase.

      • onChargeCancel

        public static void onChargeCancel(MLIapTransaction transaction)
        Tracks the occurrence of doing purchase but user canceled.
        参数:
        transaction - The transaction of purchase.
